text: In 2005, the club changed its name from "JEF United Ichihara". In the current name, JEF is a complex acronym. JEF stands for East Japan Railway Company=_JE_ and Furukawa Electric=_F_. "United" describes the unity of the team with its local supporters in Ichihara and Chiba. is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-6. in Ichihara and Chiba.Soccerway.com, "JEF United Ichihara Chiba"; retrieved 2012-3-2. The team is also known as or . ==History== The club was founded in 1946. *1946-1992 Furukawa Electric SC *1992-2004 JEF United Ichihara *2005-present JEF United Chiba == League title == *Japan Soccer League: 2 *1976, 1985/86 == League position == *2011 : J2 League - 6th *2012 : J2 League - 5th *2013 : J2 League - 5th *2014 : J2 League - 3rd *2015 : J2 League - 9th *2016 : J2 League - 11th *2017 : J2 League - 6th *2018 : J2 League - 14th *2019 : J2 League - 17th *2020 : J2 League - 14th === Former position === == Reserve team == JEF United Chiba has reserve team ; JEF Reserves. ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of JEF United Chiba players == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.so-net.ne.jp/JEFUNITED/ * J.League Club Guide Category:Football clubs in Chiba Prefecture
